result.html: an bille le do thoilThe bill, please.
result.ponchtml: an bille le do ṫoilThe bill, please.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
